review: Apple fan - I have a Yamaha AVR that came with Airplay.  It worked ok for a while but then stopped working all together.  I had an Apple TV wired up to the main room before (I moved it downstairs for music).  I ordered this one to stream music (house wide).  Its worked like a champ.  Easy setup and I like that it displays whats playing on the TV.  I don't really use it for much other than streaming music or accessing Netflix online
